content.raw: I changed priority to **blocker**, because without real-time IMU I cannot detect collision in time, and it also does not have any sense to notice that robot is up-side down a second later. I would repeat my last question: **Why did you increase IMU frequency 5 times when compared to qualification?!** I will also change it to “bug” as in my case throwing 96% of received IMU messages does not help. The situation on production machine could be different but without #176 I will not able to analyze it anyway.
content.html: I changed priority to blocker, because without real-time IMU I cannot detect collision in time, and it also does not have any sense to notice that robot is up-side down a second later. I would repeat my last question: Why did you increase IMU frequency 5 times when compared to qualification?! I will also change it to “bug” as in my case throwing 96% of received IMU messages does not help. The situation on production machine could be different but without #176 I will not able to analyze it anyway.
